title: Record-Breaking Omicron Is Now So Bad in UK Even the Queen Has Canceled Christmas
content:
1. Record-Breaking Omicron Is Now So Bad in UK Even the Queen Has Canceled Christmas  The Daily Beast
  2. Covid: people should cut down on socialising during Omicron surge, warns Chris Whitty  Guardian News
  3. Covid: People urged to socialise carefully as cases hit new record  BBC News
  4. Scale back Christmas plans, England's chief medical officer warns public  Reuters UK
  5. Cut back on socialising, says Whitty, as he predicts surge of hospitalisations  The Guardian
contentSnippet:
Record-Breaking Omicron Is Now So Bad in UK Even the Queen Has Canceled Christmas  The Daily Beast
Covid: people should cut down on socialising during Omicron surge, warns Chris Whitty  Guardian News
Covid: People urged to socialise carefully as cases hit new record  BBC News
Scale back Christmas plans, England's chief medical officer warns public  Reuters UK
Cut back on socialising, says Whitty, as he predicts surge of hospitalisations  The Guardian

localize.title: 記録的なオミクロンが、英国では女王さえもクリスマスをキャンセルするほど悪化しています。
